main event: An unidentified flying object was reported in Columbus, Ohio on 11 Feb 58 by Dr. Ralph E Collins.
interesting points: The object was described as large and circular, approximately 30-40 feet in diameter., It emitted a bright white light at the outer edge., The object hovered briefly before shooting off at high speed toward the south., Dr. Collins stated that this was an authentic sighting and he was unable to further explain it., Weather conditions during the sighting were clear night with unlimited visibility.
sighted object: large circular object emitting a bright white light
witness description: Dr. Ralph E Collins, aged 39, employed by Cahill Scientific Glass Company
